attributes.action: Ensure that all the money earned by our olympians over the next 10 years is recovered to the national purse.
attributes.additional_details: Taxpayers and national lottery punters have funded the success of those athletes who took part in the Olympics and won a medal.  As a result those people will now commence and period of HUGE financial reward (where they will, by HMRC, be encouraged to avoid paying anything above an absolute minimum of income tax - because they are not employees and will be entitled to have their payments pass across to them WITHOUT having PAYE deducted at source).  IT IS WRONG THOSE THOSE INDIVIDUALS SHOULD KEEP ANY OF THAT MONEY BECAUSE WITHOUT MY TAXES NONE OF THEIR RICHES WOULD HAVE BEEN POSSIBLE.
